executable.title: Lesion Localizer
executable.description: This is a CLI supporting module that organize a set of lesions (e.g. MS lesion load) into different predefined brain regions. Note: the regions must be in MNI space coordenates.
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos Senra Filho (University of Sao Paulo), Luiz Otavio Murta Junior (University of Sao Paulo)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by CNPq grant 405574/2017-7

image.name: outputLesionLoad
image.label: Output Lesion Load
image.description: Output lesion load with lesion located in different parts of the brain

string-vector.name: inputLocationsFile
string-vector.label: Input Priors Locations
string-vector.description: A comma separated list of binary brain regions that corresponds to the desired lesion load separation. These MUST be in MNI space coordenates.
